items.text: length outside off, comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball, he comes forward to defend. It bounced a tad more than he expected, takes the inside edge of the bat to roll towards square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: angling into the batsman from wide of the crease, patted back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: on the stumps, turning a touch, he punches it straight back to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: over the top waited for it, not much turn, gets to the pitch of the ball and lifts it over mid-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: moves a bit across to turn it fine, but short fine-leg is there
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps, whipped down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: stroked down to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: tried to angle it in to the batsman from round the wicket, but went too far down leg. Turned away to deep square-leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: fine fifty by Brendan Taylor strays on the pads again, and he clips it to deep square-leg where the man runs to his left to collect the ball
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: stands tall to punch this to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.preText: Tawhid: "This partnership looks threatening every over. Mashrafe should bring Nazmul to have a try"
items.text: length outside off, driven to extra cover. Didn't time it well
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: length outside off, and punched back to the bowler. Not middled though, it came off a thick inside edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: stays in his crease and taps it to the legside. Short midwicket can't get there with a dive, but mid-on cuts it off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.preText: Here's Nazmul Islam, round the wicket to Taylor This is Taylor's first fifty since the 138 v West Indies in World Cup qualifier
items.text: Inside out, lovely placement waited for it, and gave himself some room to lift it over the covers and into the fence
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: full toss, tossed up. Wristed to long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on the stumps, driven with the turn to long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, 1 run

items.text: comes forward to defend, it takes a thick inside edge to squrae leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: strays down leg, and he goes for the sweep, but doesn't get the placement right. The man at square leg on the fence fields it
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Williams, 1 run

items.text: full ball on the stumps, turned to short fine leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Mustyen: "So Chittagong feels like Brendan's home ground.. The way he is playing.. So comfortable. Bangladesh need to do something quick before this gets out of hand! "
items.text: kept a bit low, back of a length and angling into the batsman, doesn't rise as much as expected and raps him o nthe pads. Half-hearted appeal
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, takes a thick inside edge to go to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: short and room outside off, slashed to the man on the cover fence
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: back of a length coming into the batsman from round the wicket. He swivels and pats it down to fine-leg. That's the fifty-run partnership
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Williams, 1 run

items.text: defended, but bullet straight, and hits the stumps at the non-striker's end.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run
